summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3480 for the improvement of Alley between Block 33, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 5, and Block 33, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 7, being the alley between 19th Avenue North and 20th Avenue North, from East Highland Drive to East Galer Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43181, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
